page.title: 06A PORCHFIELD BOY.
page.content: I wake up at 7:00, but it is usually 7:30 when I get up.I catch the school bus.When I get to school I go to my classroom and sit down and Mrs Boucher tells the class to read.We have break at 10:30am. I bring 10p to school for crisps which I buy at break time,then sometimes I play dung monster, it is like catch but you are not allowed to touch black.On Thursdays at 2:00 we have games.Class 3,and 4 boys play cricket or football.I go home on the school bus at 2:45.When I get home I change,then I phone Gavin Dyer and ask if I can come and play.Gavin and I go down to our camp or we run round the fields.When I get home I have some my tea sometimes I have sausages and beans.Then I play around.Then I go to bed at 8:30pm.
